Name: Thornroot Druid
Story Background: The Thornroot Druids are attuned to the ancient magic of the forests, using their connection to nature to protect their homes from harm.
Ability: When Thornroot Druid enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
Appearance Description: The Thornroot Druid is a tall, slender elf with emerald eyes and a cloak made of woven thorns and leaves. They carry a gnarled staff crowned with a glowing green gem.
